sentences.english: Last fall, I had my first sleepover.
sentences.chinese: 去年秋天，我有了第一次外宿。

sentences.english: In the fall we sometimes hear honks as a flock of geese flies south.
sentences.chinese: 到了秋天，有时我们能听到南飞雁群的叫声。

sentences.english: Fall is the artist. (Takayuki Ikkaku, Arisa Hosaka and Toshihiro Kawabata)
Autumn disrobes the trees of leaves.
It assures us a promising season of summer and also the most iportant havvest season-autum.
sentences.chinese: 它承诺我们夏天和最重要的收获的季节秋天。

sentences.english: In autumn, the cattle have to be rounded up and counted.
sentences.chinese: 秋天得把牛群赶集起来，进行清点。

sentences.english: One fall morning, the class was abuzz with excitment.
sentences.chinese: 一个秋天的上午，全班闹腾起来。

sentences.english: Fall is the next-best season, then winter.
sentences.chinese: 其次是秋天最好，然后为冬季。

sentences.english: Autumn is a lively season for the wool market.
sentences.chinese: 秋天是毛织品畅销的季节。

sentences.english: B：It's very colorful because many leaves of trees change colours in autumn.
sentences.chinese: 秋天是色彩缤纷的，因为各种树叶在秋天改变了颜色。

sentences.english: B：It's very colorful because many leaves of trees change colours in autumn.
sentences.chinese: 秋天是色彩缤纷的，因为各种树叶在秋天改变了颜色。

sentences.english: In the fall, the leaves of both types turn a brilliant red.
sentences.chinese: 在秋天这两种叶子会变成鲜艳的红色。

sentences.english: Autumn is a great time of the year.
sentences.chinese: 秋天是一年中的好时节。

sentences.english: Campuss of autumn of blossoming flowers, the scent of airtime, charming.
sentences.chinese: 秋天的校园鲜花朵朵，争奇斗艳，芬芳迷人。

sentences.english: It was a drizzly day in autumn.
sentences.chinese: 那是秋天的一天，下着小雨。

sentences.english: The fields in autumn are fruity.

definition: early autumn/7th month of the lunar calendar
